name: slimegamedemo
description:
blink  - "space", 

dash  - "shift+space", 

basicattack -  "LPM", 

spell - "RPM",

target with mouse coursor, 

move with - WSAD

Press on the chests to open them and on weapons and spells to pick them up.

After killing all slimes go to the centre of the map, heal and press on the portal block to start another wave.

The game is based on elements. Enemy slimes, weapons and spells use them. Each element has one weak-against and one strong-against element.
